summary.para: Gets the name of the main package dependency from the AppxManifest.xml.

param.name: name
param.para: The name of the main package dependency.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the package family name of the main package dependency from the AppxManifest.xml.

param.name: packageFamilyName
param.para: The package family name of the main package dependency.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the publisher of the main package dependency from the AppxManifest.xml.

param.name: publisher
param.para: The publisher of the main package dependency.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides access to attribute values of the main package dependency.
